OK, Got It!

Thank you for trying Handwash Tracking!

This app is designed to track hourly handwashes for employees in restaurants or other applicable companies. It uses motion detection at the end of the process to verify that the handwasher is still present and didn\'t leave prematurely.

In this current version, both the Free and Paid tiers store all stats locally on this device. We are planning a future release that will support multi-device connections and user authentication for companies.

For the Free Version, please note the following limitations:

• Up to 15 employees can be added.

• Employee data import (CSV) is disabled.

• Custom branding and logo upload features are disabled.

Enjoy the app! Consider upgrading to Pro for no limitations and no Ad\'s! Stay tuned for future versions and updates.
Welcome to your Admin Dashboard!

Here\'s a quick guide to the main sections:

• Today\'s Overview:
At the top, you can quickly see today\'s handwash activity.

• Manage Employees & App Logo:
Use these buttons to add/edit your staff members or to set your Company\'s logo on the main screen.

• Hourly Compliance Report:
A powerful tool to track hourly handwash compliance for all employees.

• Handwash Log Utilities:
Search for past records by date/employee, and download/share reports.

• More Options (⋮):
The menu in the top-right corner lets you change your password, delete data, view the new Help Guide, or log out.
Got It!
Please wave your hand in front of the camera to confirm you are present.
Privacy Policy
https://sweetrap1.github.io/handwashing/privacy.html
Camera Access Required
This app uses the front-facing camera for motion detection to confirm that a handwash has been completed. No pictures or videos are ever recorded or stored. Please allow camera access to continue.

This is the first screen of the app. 

• Start Handwash: Enter an active employee's number and press "Start" to begin the guided 35-second handwashing process. 

• Guest User: If you are not a registered employee or just want to log a wash without a specific user, enter employee number 0. 

• Leaderboard: The table on the right shows a live leaderboard of the top 5 hand-washers for the current day. 

• Admin Login: Access the admin area by tapping the three-dot menu (⋮) in the top-right and selecting "Admin Login".
After logging in (default user/pass: admin/admin), this is your control center. It provides an at-a-glance overview and access to all administrative functions.
Manage Employees

• Add: Use the '+' button to add a new employee manually. 
• Edit: Tap the pencil icon next to an employee to change their name, department, or active status. 
• Delete: Tap the trash icon to permanently remove an employee. Note: The Guest (0) user cannot be deleted. 
• Import: Use the upload icon in the toolbar to bulk-import employees from a CSV file (this feature is for the pro version).
Hourly Compliance Report

This powerful report shows which employees have washed their hands during each operational hour. 

• How it works: It checks for at least one handwash per employee between the first and last wash of their day. A green check (✅) means they washed during that hour, while a red cross (❌) means they did not. 

• Filtering: You can filter the report by a specific date, department, or employee name. 

• Sharing: Use the share icon in the toolbar to export the current view as a CSV file.
Handwash Log Utilities

• Search: Find specific handwash records by filtering by name, employee ID, or a date range. \n• Download: Export handwash data as a CSV file. You can choose a "Summary" report (total washes per employee) or a "Detailed" report (every single wash event).
Other Options-Three-Dot Menu ⋮

From the admin dashboard's top-right menu, you can: 

• Change Password: It is highly recommended to change the default admin password. 

• Delete Data: Permanently delete handwash logs within a specified date range. This action cannot be undone. 

• Privacy Policy: View the app's privacy policy. 

• Logout: Securely log out of the admin dashboard.
